item.title: Homing missile
item.description: Problem You need a “homing missile” - a projectile that will seek a moving target. Solution For this example, we’ll use an Area2D node for the projectile. Areas are typically good choices for bullets because we need to detect when they contact something. If you also need a bullet that bounces/ricochets, one of the PhysicsBody type node might be a better choice. The node setup and behavior of the missile is the same you would use for a “dumb” bullet.
